goals__remit: STM Savunma Teknolojileri Mühendislik ve Ticaret A.Ş. was established in 1991 to provide system engineering, technical support, project management, technology transfer and logistics support services as well as creating the software technologies for civil and military systems and establishing and operating the computer centers for development and maintenance/operation purposes. The company provides technology-focused consultancy services and engineering solutions in national and international projects.
